comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: English translation: A so-called bridge puller doing his work. Bridge pullers helped, for a small fee, to draw heavy carts over the steep bridges of the Amsterdam canals.

comment.author: 22408734@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Amsterdam en Amsterdammers uit reeds lang vervlogen tijden, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
